title: Her Eternal Rogue
description: Alexander Barrington flees his tyrannical uncle for the open seas where he becomes a ruthless pirate who turns vampire.Captured and sentence to hang, a fate he must avoid to keep his vampire self hidden, a reprieve comes if he rescues Lady Lavinia Sinclair from the French pirates and returns her to her betrothed in England. Alexander falls for the woman who makes him feel human and alive, but can he really have her without exposing what he is â€“ a thief, the undead? The damned? Refusing to taint her innocence any further, he erases her memory of him and vanquishes into the night but can he really exist without her?
author: Gina Danna
